home.title: Sponk Keramik & Courses Düsseldorf
home.subtitle: Discover the art of ceramic painting and pottery in our studio. Handcrafted ceramic art and creative workshops for beginners and advanced students.

ceramicPainting.title: Ceramic Painting
ceramicPainting.description: Paint pre-made ceramic pieces according to your wishes. A wide selection of shapes and colors is available to you.

potteryCourses.title: Pottery Courses / + Building
potteryCourses.description: Learn the traditional art of pottery on the potter's wheel / workbench. Under expert guidance, you will create your own work of art.

handcraftedCeramics.title: Handcrafted Ceramic Art
handcraftedCeramics.description: Discover unique ceramic artworks by Bülent Tepe. Each piece is unique and crafted with attention to detail.
